document.full_text: at least 17 people were killed when an express train collided with a crowded jeep which was driving across an unmanned railway crossing in the eastern indian state of bihar, police said on sunday.
document.title: train collides with jeep in eastern india, 17 dead
lines_and_colors: at least 17 people were killed when an express train collided with a crowded jeep which was driving across an unmanned railway crossing in the eastern indian state of bihar, police said on sunday.
